Reference

Workflow

folder_setup()

Setup Folder Structure in Project

return_latest()

Return Latest File

set_paths()

Set SI local folder paths

setup_gitignore()

Setup gitignore in Project

setup_readme()

Setup README with Disclaimer in Project

si_path()

Access SI folderpath

si_setup()

Default SI Project Setup

extract_excel_data()

Extract data from excel link

extract_tbl_data()

Extract table data from web page

Authentication

datim_pwd()

Return DATIM password

datim_user()

Return DATIM username

pano_pwd()

Return PEPFAR Panorama password

pano_user()

Return PEPFAR Panorama username

pdap_access()

Store PDAP Access Key credentials

pdap_secret()

Store PDAP Secret Access Key credentials

pdap_bucket()

Access PDAP read/write bucket

get_s3key()

Get S3 Credentials - Access or Secret Access Key

load_secrets()

Load credentials

is_stored()

Test if service is stored in credential manager

get_key()

Get value of service key name

get_keys()

Get Service Keys

get_services()

Get Services

get_account()

Get account details

Authentication Setup

set_datim()

Store DATIM credentials

set_email()

Store USAID email

set_pano()

Store PEPFAR Panorama credentials

set_s3keys()

Store S3 Credentials

set_key()

Set value for service name

set_account()

Create / Update account

Google Drive

gdrive_folder()

Get id of googledrive folder

import_drivefile()

Import file from a Google Drive folder

export_drivefile()

Export local files for googledrive folder

gdrive_metadata()

Unpack Google Drive Metadata

Tidying

clean_countries()

Clean Natural Earth Country names to match PEPFAR Data

clean_filename()

Clean Filename

connect_text()

Clean and connect parts of text together

extract_text()

Extract text

lookup_country()

Lookup official Country name

Date Conversion

curr_date()

Get formatted current date

convert_date_to_qtr()

Convert Date to FY Quarter/Period

convert_datim_pd_to_qtr()

Convert DATIM CY Quarter/Period to FY Quarter

convert_qtr_to_date()

Convert FY Quarter/Period to Date

convert_fy_qtr_to_pd()

Convert Fiscal Year and Quarter into Period
